#### PR description:

Attempt to follow up on #35489, based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35489#issuecomment-932229466

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
Tried to validate that the address sanitizer issues reported at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35489#issue-1012240078 are removed, but in `CMSSW_12_3_ASAN_X_2022-01-03-2300` I do not observe failures in step2 of WF 11834.0 (see also [IB logs](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/html/cmssdt-ib/#/relVal/CMSSW_12_3/2022-01-10-2300?selectedArchs=slc7_amd64_gcc11&selectedFlavors=ASAN_X&selectedStatus=failed) )
